short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate product prices from PodXmas Store
short.vi: Tính toán giá sản phẩm từ PodXmas Store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PodXmas is a Chrome browser extension that helps you easily experience shopping and calculate product prices from the PodXmas Store, with unique and convenient features.

Convenient Interface:

Friendly interface design, creating a feeling of comfort and ease of use.
The website background is animated by a wonderful gradient, creating an interesting feeling.
Search product:

Enter keywords in the search box to quickly find the desired product.
Press the "Search" button to open the PodXmas Store page with search results.
Product Price Calculation:

Choose products from PodXmas Store's diverse list.
Enter quantity to automatically calculate final price and discount (if any).
Diverse Product List:

Harry I Love Baker’s Heart Shirt: Price 25.95 USD, Discount 22.11 USD.
Turtle nurse Seriously... T-shirt: Price 26.91 USD, Discount 22.11 USD.
Jack Skellington Quarantined T-shirt: Price 26.91 USD, Sale 19.22 USD.
Save The Planet Kill Yourself 1994... Shirts: Price 22.99 USD, Discount 21.84 USD.
It’s Fine I’m Fine Everything... Shirt: Price 45 USD, Discount 43.27 USD.
Weekend Forecast Reading... Shirt: Price 25.95 USD, Discount 22.11 USD.
User manual:

Search product:

Enter keywords in the search box.
Click "Search" to explore PodXmas products.
Product Price Calculation:

Select product and enter quantity.
Click "Calculate Price" to view price information and discounts.
More information:

Support effective online shopping from PodXmas Store.
Accurate and fast results with special calculation features.
Guaranteed quality and attractive discounts.
